players.name: Alice
memory: You investigated Charlie and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Bob: "I think Bob might be the mafioso. He acted suspiciously last night and was looking at Diana."
You: "I'm going to investigate Bob tonight. His behavior last night and his suspicion of me being the mafioso are concerning."
Charlie: "Charlie is the mafioso. I killed Diana last night to protect my position. Alice, your investigation of Bob might be unnecessary as the evidence points to me."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Bob
